basics.name: Gabriel Windlin
basics.label: Computer Science Student @ ETH Z端rich | Systems & Security Enthusiast
basics.summary: Computer Science student at ETH Z端rich. I'm most interested in Systems Programming, Cyber Security, and Machine Learning. I am always open to collaborating on interesting projects or discussing new ideas in tech. Feel free to connect!

work.name: VIS ETHZ
work.summary: Managing association infrastructure by deploying student services and maintaining on-premise Kubernetes clusters.
highlights: Deployed 'Rallly' on the association's local cluster using Kubernetes.
Configured container orchestration and networking for self-hosted student services.
Maintained and monitored on-premise server resources, gaining hands-on Linux administration experience.

work.name: PureGym / Skills Park
work.summary: Providing high-quality customer service and ensuring seamless operations within a dynamic, high-traffic fitness environment.
highlights: Developed strong interpersonal and communication skills serving a diverse client base.
Maintained environment safety and equipment functionality.
Managed cash drawer accounting and optimized workflow efficiency with team members.

projects.name: Raw Socket Packet Sniffer
projects.description: Low-level network analysis tool utilizing raw sockets to intercept and decode Ethernet frames with live traffic visualization.
highlights: Manual parsing of Ethernet, IP, TCP, and UDP protocols
Custom PCAP implementation for seamless Wireshark integration
Dynamic protocol filtering and deep packet payload inspection

projects.name: Neural Network
projects.description: Modular deep learning framework engineered in pure C, implementing backpropagation, momentum, and gradient checking from first principles.
highlights: Efficient matrix-based backpropagation implementation
Dynamic topology supporting various activation functions
Optimization techniques: L2 Regularization and Momentum

projects.name: Our Place
projects.description: Collaborative web platform featuring synchronized media playback, interactive memory mapping, and gamified relationship progress tracking.
highlights: Scalable architecture using React 18 and Supabase
Low-latency data and media synchronization
Geocoding integration for interactive spatial memories

projects.name: Kiroku-TUI
projects.description: Terminal-based journaling application developed in Rust, optimized for speed with fuzzy search, Git integration, and live file monitoring.
highlights: Responsive TUI built with Rust and Ratatui
Automated version control via Git-based synchronization
Fast content discovery with fuzzy search and metadata tagging

projects.name: TCP Port Scanner
projects.description: Efficient single-file TCP scanner leveraging non-blocking I/O and select() to achieve rapid port discovery in C.
highlights: Non-blocking socket architecture for precise timeout control
Advanced error handling with EINPROGRESS and SO_ERROR
Lightweight implementation with zero external dependencies

projects.name: SEC-SUITE
projects.description: Versatile security toolkit designed for automated password auditing and network vulnerability analysis across multiple protocols.
highlights: Advanced password cracking using Markov and Dictionary models
Scalable multi-threaded engine for high-speed brute forcing
Comprehensive support for modern bcrypt and argon2 hashes

projects.name: Homelab Infrastructure
projects.description: Self-hosted microservices ecosystem optimized for resource efficiency and high availability on consumer-grade hardware.
highlights: Containerized deployment using Docker Compose and Caddy
Resource-efficient PostgreSQL and Redis shared instance patterns
Enhanced security via CrowdSec and Split-Horizon DNS

projects.name: Matrix Calculator
projects.description: Mathematical computation engine providing a suite of linear algebra operations through a responsive web interface.
highlights: Robust backend powered by Java and Spring Boot
Interactive user interface built with modern React
RESTful API architecture for seamless data processing

projects.name: Dotfiles
projects.description: Automated system configuration and development environment tailored for Arch Linux, focused on productivity and reproducibility.
highlights: Custom Neovim, Zsh, and Hyprland environment setups
Modular installation scripts for rapid system deployment
Declarative configuration following Infrastructure as Code principles

projects.name: Chat Application
projects.description: Direct TCP client-server communication suite implemented in C to explore concurrency and socket programming fundamentals.
highlights: Core networking built with the BSD socket API
Concurrent connection handling for multiple active users
Intuitive CLI for real-time message exchange

projects.name: Screen Savor
projects.description: Cinematic discovery platform integrating with the TMDB API to provide a seamless movie browsing and search experience.
highlights: Dynamic data retrieval with optimized TMDB API calls
Mobile-first responsive design for all device types
Efficient state management using vanilla JavaScript

projects.name: Upcoming Project
projects.description: Currently developing an ambitious new project in the lab. Stay tuned for the official reveal and open-source release.
highlights: Research and development phase
Experimental feature implementation
Public beta coming soon

projects.name: Have an idea?
projects.description: Passionate about building impactful technology and always open to new challenges, collaborations, or technical discussions.
highlights: Open source collaboration
Innovative project development
Available for technical consulting
